Break Free From Addiction. While Staying Connected to Life

What we treat

How we can help you

We specialize in treating addiction and co-occurring mental health conditions through flexible, outpatient programs. Whether you need intensive daily support or a part-time structure, our team will guide you to the right level of care — without disrupting your life, work, or family.

Substance Use
Depression
Anxiety
PTSD & Trauma
Bipolar Disorder
Dual Diagnosis
Programs

Discover the Right
Level of Care for You

Proven, personalized programs designed to treat the whole person — mind, body, and spirit.

01

Partial Hospitalization Program (PHP)

For those who need structured, daily clinical care without inpatient stay

  • 5–6 days/week
  • Psychiatric support
  • group therapy
  • Live at home
  • Insurance typically covers
02

Intensive Outpatient Program (IOP)

Clients balancing recovery with work, school, or home life

  • Morning or evening sessions
  • 3–5 days/week
  • Small group therapy
  • Ideal for transition phase
03

Dual Diagnosis Program

For: Co-occurring mental health + substance use issues. Addiction + mental health treatment

  • Trauma
  • Anxiety
  • Disorders care
  • Personalized medication management
  • Confidential
04

Comprehensive Therapy Services

For: Building long-term emotional resilience and relationships. Lifelong mental & emotional health

  • 1-on-1 counseling
  • Family + couples therapy
  • CBT, DBT, mindfulness
  • Post-treatment support
Verify Insurance
Benefits

Why Clients
Trust & Stay With Us

More than just treatment — we create a path to real, lasting recovery with flexibility, compassion, and clinical excellence

  • 01

    Dual Diagnosis Experts

    We treat both addiction and underlying mental health conditions like anxiety, depression, and PTSD — with psychiatrist-led plans and integrated care.

  • 02

    Private, Comfortable Setting

    No sterile hospital feel — our space is calming, modern, and built for healing. You’ll feel safe, supported, and respected from day one.

  • 03

    Flexible Scheduling

    Choose morning or evening sessions, 3–5 days a week — so you can recover without putting your job, school, or family on hold.

  • 04

    Covered by Most Insurance Providers

    We work with Aetna, Multiplan, and more. Our team verifies your benefits quickly and helps you understand all your options.
